explanation: [0-0] On a street, a woman with short hair, wearing a blue dress with red handprints, is standing with her back to the camera. There are some buildings and vehicles around. The logo of the game's name is in the upper left corner of the screen.

[0-9] Then the woman walks forward, the camera zooms out, a man is lying on a mat on the ground on the left, clutching his hands, the woman bends down and puts a stack of banknotes in a plate next to the man, floating red hearts appear in the picture, the man sits up, he is shirtless and wearing blue shorts. The woman waves to the man and continues walking to the right when suddenly a zombie wrapped in red lines flies from the right, knocking the woman to the ground and pinning her down. The man sitting on the ground opens his mouth in surprise and leans back, a yellow surprised emoji appears on the right. Then two rows of game icons appear on the left, with a greenish-gray baseball bat above them, and a pointing up gesture icon appears to the right of these icons. The gesture then points to the red icon in the middle and drags it down to the purple icon below, then eliminates it, dropping colorful pieces.

[9-18] Then the greenish-gray baseball bat flies to the right and lands in the hands of the man sitting on the ground, a golden light rises around the man's right hand, the man picks up the baseball bat and gets up, hitting the zombie pressing on the woman, the zombie flies to the right, the man and woman run to the right, followed by the zombie, then they run inside a building and stop, there is a pointing up gesture above them, a green inverted triangle icon above the man's head, then drag the green icon and the yellow human head icon to swap positions, the green icon deletes the green light and turns into a tool that lands in the woman's hand, the woman takes the tool and throws it back, a ball of flame explodes on the left, and the zombie falls to the ground.
